name: mapConcatChunk
signature: { <A, A2>(f: (a: A) => Chunk<A2>): <E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A2, E, R>; <A, E, R, A2>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, f: (a: A) => Chunk<A2>): Stream<A2, E, R>; }
description:
Maps each element to a chunk, and flattens the chunks into the output of
this stream.
documentation:
